sql.query:
SELECT ISNULL(SUM(SECTOR_AM), 1000000) FROM MONTHLY_FUND_STK_INDUSTRY a, FUND_MASTER b WHERE a.FUND_CD=b.FUND_CD AND a.SECTOR_CD='I.201' AND a.DT=(SELECT MAX(DT) FROM MONTHLY_FUND_STK_INDUSTRY WHERE DT <=? AND SECTOR_CD='I.201') AND CLASS_CD= ?
at isolation 0

INSERT INTO #jusik1( SECTOR_CD, CLASS_CD, SECTOR_AM_SUM) SELECT SECTOR_CD, CLASS_CD, AVG(SEC_STOCK_MKT_WG) FROM MONTHLY_FUND_STK_INDUSTRY a, FUND_MASTER b WHERE a.FUND_CD = b.FUND_CD AND a.DT=(SELECT MAX(DT) FROM MONTHLY_FUND_STK_INDUSTRY a, FUND_MASTER b WHERE a.FUND_CD = b.FUND_CD AND DT <=? AND CLASS_CD = ?) AND CLASS_CD = ? AND SECTOR_CD in ( 'I.224','I.226','I.227','I.229','I.231','I.237','I.241','I.242','I.243' ) GROUP BY SECTOR_CD, CLASS_CD
SELECT d.IndustNm, a.SEC_STOCK_WG, CASE WHEN b.MKT_RATIO = NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.MKT_RATIO END, c.SECTOR_AM_SUM, b.M1_RTN FROM MONTHLY_FUND_STK_INDUSTRY a, MONTHLY_BM_ANL b, #jusik1 c, FAMASTER.dbo.FAA_STK_INDUSTRY_INFO d WHERE a.DT=(SELECT MAX(DT) FROM MONTHLY_FUND_STK_INDUSTRY WHERE DT <=? AND SECTOR_CD='I.201') AND b.DT=(SELECT MAX(DT) FROM MONTHLY_FUND_STK_INDUSTRY WHERE DT <=? AND SECTOR_CD='I.201') AND a.FUND_CD=? --AND a.FUND_CD = c.FUND_CD AND a.SECTOR_CD=c.SECTOR_CD AND a.SECTOR_CD in ( 'I.224','I.226','I.227','I.229','I.231','I.237','I.241','I.242','I.243') AND a.SECTOR_CD=b.BM_CD AND a.SECTOR_CD=d.IndustCd ORDER BY a.SEC_STOCK_WG DESC
at isolation 0
create table #jusik1 ( SECTOR_CD char(7) null, CLASS_CD char(13) null, SECTOR_AM_SUM numeric(27,20) null )
